name: Jeffrey Keenan
text: You helped me get my Angular developer job. Your classes are easy to understand technically, but I also needed your words 'you can do this' encouragement. It helped me be patient and focus.

name: Alex Suprun
text: Just finished the React Course  . This guy just covered the every little possible thing in his course regarding react and thinking like a better software developer. Thanks once again sir. You are truly an inspiration.

name: Julian Wan
text: Amazing JS course, for beginners as well as professionals. You explained in-depth concepts of each module of ES6 with best practices. I had learned in the course was used in real world applications
